title: This is a story of George.
review: George is a son of King George Ⅴ. The King asked him to give important speech. However that is not well received by people. George is stammering symptom. Therefor he could not speak well at the speech. He decides to start treatment.I like this movie. I don't know about the history of Britain. However I could learn history of Britain in this movie. In the first scene, I pity with George. However in the last scene, he was hanged so much, and I think he is cool. This movie made me feel happy. I was glad and surprised that he was changed. The tone, characters and camera-work are wonderful.I like this movie. George is so good. I recommend you to watch this movie, because this movie gives me brave. And this movie made me happy. Therefor if you watch this movie, you are going to feel happy.

title: This is a story oｆ aｎ alien.
review: Aliens come to the earth, however one of them misses the UFO and the alien stays the earth. Elliot finds that, and he named the alien ET. Elliot takes ET his house and he starts to take care of him.I think this movie is very famous and popular. The director is Steven Spielberg. He is so famous director. His many films are wonderful. ET is one of them. I like love movie. The music of this movie is known by many people. I like it. The tone and camera-work are excellent. I like the characters. I love ET. He is an alien and his appearance is not good, however he is so charming. I think almost people who have watched this movie like him. This movie has many famous scenes. In the last scene, I was so moved.I love this movie. It made me feel happy. I recommend you to watch this movie.

title: This is pretty love story.
review: Tom believes the love that is destined. He falls in love with Summer. He thinks that his hobby and her hobby matches and he has come to love her even more. However she does not believe the love that is destined. Tom is always wrapped around Summer's finger.I love this movie so much. The music, the tone and camera-work are perfect. I love the characters too. I like Tom and Summer. He is a single-minded person. He always thinks of Summer. However Summer is not like Tom. She is a little selfish girl. However she is always natural about her mind. Therefor Tom is always wrapped around her finger. This is the highlight of this movie. This movie has wonderful ending. When I watched the last scene, I was so surprised and so excited.I recommend you to watch this movie. I think this is an excellent movie. When you finish the movie, you will feel happy.

title: This is a story of the human vs. the robot.
review: This is an action movie. The war of the human being vs. the robot happens. The reader of the human is John. The robot sees their defeat. Therefor the robot sends Terminator at the past to kill John's mother. John knew that and he sends a man to protect his mother too.This is really popular movie. I like this movie too. I like character. Especially I like Terminator. He is so cool. Arnold Schwarzenegger acts Terminator. He is popular actor, and his acting is wonderful. This movie is full of spectacular battle scene, and they are powerful. Therefor I was excited so much. The ending is good, however it is a little sad.This is wonderful action movie and I think this is almost love story. It made me so excited. If you like action movie, I recommend you to watch it. I think that this movie will make you excited.

title: This is a story of Pi and a tiger.
review: Pi and his family run a zoo. They go for a voyage with many animals. However they were caught in a storm. Pi and a tiger left in a lifeboat. The dangerous life of Pi and the tiger on the lifeboat starts.I like this movie. The music and the tone are wonderful. The color of this movie is too beautiful. The color is the most beautiful which I have ever seen in movie. I was really moving. I like the characters. I was afraid of the tiger and I hate him in the first scene. However the tiger is pretty and I came to like him in the last scene. Various problems happen in sequence in this story. Therefor I was always excited and my heart throbs when I was watching this movie.This movie is particular about the color. That is so beautiful. This movie will make you moved.

title: This is a love story.
review: George is a great actor and he is so popular in 1927, and Peppy love him. Thanks to him she becomes an actress. However he loses his popularity, and she becomes star actress. Gorge loses him home at last, however Peppy still loves him.This is a wonderful love story. When I watched this movie, I was moved so much. This is a black and white film. I don't like black and white film. However I love this black and white movie. I love characters. Especially I love Peppy, because she is a single minded to George. I love the last scene. I just died of cuteness. This movie made me feel sad and happy.I love this story. I like characters. This is so moving movie. Therefor I want everyone to watch it. I think this movie will make you feel happy. And I want to watch it again.

title: This is an action movie.
review: This is an action movie. A man plant a bomb in a bus. If the bus runs by at a speed of less than 80 kilometers, the bomb explodes. Jack who is a police swings the bus, and he tries to help passengers with Annie who is one of passengers and he asks her drive the bus.I love action movie and I love this movie so much. I think this is a breathtaking movie. Therefor I was so excited when I was watching the movie. Especially, I was so excited in the last scene. Jack and Annie are in a terrible pinch. I like the scene the best. I think this movie is also love story. I like Jack. He is cool, masculine and brave. The music, tone and camera-work are nice.I recommend people who likes action movie to watch the movie. I think that this movie will make you so excited.

title: This is a story of the founder of Facebook.
review: Mark Zuckerberg is the founder of Facebook. He is a popular man today. He makes this site when he is a university student. This is a story about him and the process before Facebook being made.This is so interesting story, because so many people have the account of Facebook today, and we can know the process before it being made. I think this story is a little complicated. Therefor it is difficult to understand the story. In particular I cannot understand the last scene. It is significant. The music, the tone and camera-work are great. However I don't like characters. Mark is an odd fellow and he is not good person. I don't like him.This is so popular movie and I know many people who like this movie. I think this is a wonderful movie too. However I cannot understand the story. Therefor I don't recommend you to watch this movie.
